author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5178: File consumer should use exception handler to handle all component specific exceptions. Add example how to plugin a custom exception handler and send that to a Camel route so Camel routing onException can deal with the exception. Reduce the out of the box logging exception handler to WARN level.

author: sagara
msg: AXIS2-5292 - Fixed compilation  issues and updated according to Axis2 and Axiom APIs.

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-3996: sysreqs.html is a raw page

author: stefan2
msg: Skip test execution in named atomic test when preconditions are not satisfied.
(init_test_shm): skip test when SHM functionality is not accessible
(test_multiprocess): skip if proc is not available
(main): make execution with no parameters a no-op
